MovieDetails.description: Driven by tragedy, billionaire Bruce Wayne dedicates his life to uncovering and defeating the corruption that plagues his home, Gotham City. Unable to work within the system, he instead creates a new identity, a symbol of fear for the criminal underworld - The Batman.
MovieDetails.producers: DC Comics, Legendary Entertainment, DC Entertainment, Syncopy, Patalex III Productions Limited, Warner Bros. Pictures

MovieDetails.tagline: Welcome to the world without rules
MovieDetails.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
MovieDetails.producers: Warner Bros. Pictures, Legendary Entertainment (in association with), Syncopy, DC Comics

MovieDetails.description: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.
MovieDetails.producers: Warner Bros. Pictures, Legendary Entertainment, DC Entertainment, Syncopy, DC Comics

MovieDetails.tagline: Your mind is the scene of the crime
MovieDetails.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
MovieDetails.producers: Warner Bros. Limited, Legendary Entertainment, Syncopy

MovieDetails.tagline: Mankind was born on Earth. It was never meant to die here.
MovieDetails.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
MovieDetails.producers: Paramount Pictures, Warner Bros. Pictures, Legendary Entertainment, Syncopy, Lynda Obst Productions, Government of Alberta, Alberta Media Fund, Atvinnuvega- og nýsköpunarráðuneytið

MovieDetails.tagline: How much can you know about yourself if you've never been in a fight?
MovieDetails.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.
MovieDetails.producers: Fox 2000 Pictures, Regency Enterprises, Linson Films, Atman Entertainment, Knickerbocker Films, Medusa Film, Taurus Film

MovieDetails.description: An ex-hit-man comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that killed his dog and took everything from him.
MovieDetails.producers: Summit Entertainment, Thunder Road Pictures, 87Eleven, MJW Films, DefyNite Films, Cutting Edge Group, Huayi Brothers Media, Company Films, Poquito Productions, Unbelievable Entertainment

MovieDetails.tagline: If you have what it takes... You can have it ALL!
MovieDetails.description: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Conner must decide where his loyalty really lies when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.
MovieDetails.producers: Universal Pictures, Original Film, Mediastream Film GmbH & Co. Productions KG, Ardustry Entertainment

MovieDetails.description: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.
MovieDetails.producers: Hollywood Pictures, Spyglass Entertainment, The Kennedy/Marshall Company, Barry Mendel Productions

MovieDetails.movieName: Batman vs Superman: Dawn of Justice
MovieDetails.description: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.
MovieDetails.producers: Warner Bros. Pictures, Atlas Entertainment, Cruel & Unusual Films, DC Comics, DC Entertainment, RatPac-Dune Entertainment, Zak Productions
